item.title: Monitoring worldwide travel patterns with Euromonitor
item.description:
Source: Euromonitor website. Euromonitor International, a market research provider, has published its annual World Travel Market Global Trends Report. This 2014 edition, like the previous nine, identifies emerging patterns in the travel industry. For the Asia Pacific and Middle East regions, the report highlights these key trends: The Middle East is using design tourism to reshape its image. By integrating design into tourist attractions and experiences, the region hopes to attract more visitors and creative professionals...
